Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Gempa bumi terjadi tiba-tiba di tengah malam.
English Translation: "An earthquake happened suddenly in the middle of the night."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Di kota besar, gedung pencakar langit banyak ditemukan.
English Translation: "In big cities, skyscrapers are found in abundance."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Saat sudah gelap, sebaiknya kamu kembali ke rumah.
English Translation: "When it's dark, you should go back home."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Gaun yang dikenakan oleh pengantin sungguh indah.
English Translation: "The wedding dress worn by the bride was truly beautiful."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Letakkan jaketmu pada gantungan mantel itu.
English Translation: "Put your jacket on that coat hanger."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Gunakan garpu saat makan steak untuk memotong daging.
English Translation: "Use a fork to cut the meat when eating steak."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Banyak bangunan hancur akibat gempa bumi yang terjadi kemarin.
English Translation: "Many buildings were destroyed due to yesterday's earthquake."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Mereka akan menikmati segelas anggur saat makan malam.
English Translation: "They will enjoy a glass of wine during dinner."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Bajuku memiliki motif garis-garis yang warnanya seimbang.
English Translation: "My clothes have stripes pattern with balanced colors."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Raisa tampil memukau dengan gaun malamnya pada acara tersebut.
English Translation: "Raisa looked stunning with her evening gown at the event."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Banyak orang yang tinggal di gedung apartemen karena harganya yang lebih terjangkau.
English Translation: "Many people live in an apartment building because it is more affordable."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Pastikan area tersebut tidak terdapat gas sebelum melakukan pengelasan.
English Translation: "Make sure the area is free of gas before welding."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Gedung olahraga itu dilengkapi dengan berbagai fasilitas untuk kegiatan olahraga.
English Translation: "The sport center is equipped with various facilities for sports activities."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Ia merasa gelisah dan tak bisa diam menunggu kabar dari sahabatnya.
English Translation: "She felt anxious and couldn't sit still waiting for news from her friend."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Salah satu gejala flu adalah demam.
English Translation: "One symptom of flu is fever."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Ia suka menggunakan jas dengan motif garis-garis kecil.
English Translation: "He likes to wear suits with pinstripe pattern."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Kaki saya terasa gatal setelah berjalan seharian.
English Translation: "My feet feel itchy after walking all day."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Gedung ini merupakan landmark kota tersebut karena arsitekturnya yang unik.
English Translation: "This building is a landmark of the city due to its unique architecture."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Banyak blog fashion yang membahas tentang gaya busana korea.
English Translation: "Many fashion blogs discuss Korean fashion style."

Sentence in Indonesian using the words: Tambahkan sedikit garam untuk membuat masakanmu lebih enak.
English Translation: "Add a pinch of salt to make your dish taste better."
